description: Allows the user to produce and manipulate wax at will. The wax is highly versatile and can be used for offense, defense, and utility purposes. The wax is as hard as steel when solidified.

users.circumstances: Mr. 3 (Galdino) is the known user of this Devil Fruit.

abilityReveals.description: Mr. 3 creates a large wall of hardened wax that can block attacks. Crucially revealed to be able to resist Magellan's poison.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to block Magellan's poisonous Hydra attack during the Impel Down escape, revealing that wax can counter poison.

abilityReveals.description: Mr. 3 can coat other people with his wax to create protective armor. Used to create the 'Champion Luffy' armor on Luffy's fists and feet.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Applied to Luffy to allow him to fight Magellan without being poisoned, creating the Champion Luffy technique.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Wax can be melted by extreme heat

strengths.strength: Wax is as hard as steel when solidified
strengths.description: The hardened wax can withstand powerful attacks and is difficult to break.
Mr. 3's wax can block and resist Magellan's deadly poison, making it an effective counter to the Doku Doku no Mi.
